computerplayer

Class Avatar

  • java.lang.Object
    • computerplayer.Avatar

  • public class Avatar
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the computer avatar and its visual and game components. Also manages the avatar's life.
    Version:
    5/20
    Author:
    Radhika Agarwal

        public Avatar()

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup(java.awt.Point start)
        Drawing Surface calls this method at the very beginning of the game Places the avatar at the starting location
        Parameters:
        start - Point object representing the starting point on the maze

      • move

        public void move(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> path,
                 DrawingSurface surface)
        Drawing Surface calls this method after finding path from Maze class. It passes in the path returned and the avatar moves based on this info
        Parameters:
        path - Arraylist of points that lead the Avatar from the starting point to the exit
        surface - DrawingSurface that it moves on

      • draw

        public void draw(DrawingSurface surface,
                 int gridLength,
                 int windowX,
                 int windowY)
        Draws the Avatar as a small, red rectangle
        Parameters:
        surface - Drawing Surface
        gridLength - Length of each small grid on the window
        windowX - the x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the grid on the window
        windowY - the y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the grid on the window
